Question.Subject: My broadband connection keeps failing......?
Question.Content: At what are obviously busy times on the net. I use Firefox via Orange. Anybody else had a problem please?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi,
At busy peak times you may notice your connection lags and then drops completely, if you already have a high connection signal the only other thing you could really do is make sure you are running the lastest software provided by Orange.

Answer.Content:
